352: Gannett Co., Inc. (NYSE: GCI) is a subscription-led and digitally-focused media and marketing solutions company committed to empowering communities to thrive. With an unmatched reach at the national and local level, Gannett touches the lives of millions with our Pulitzer Prize-winning content, consumer experiences and benefits, and advertiser products and services. Our current portfolio of media assets includes The USA TODAY NETWORK, which includes USA TODAY, and local media organizations in 43 states in the United States, and Newsquest, a wholly-owned subsidiary operating in the United Kingdom. We also own digital marketing services companies under the brand LocaliQ, which provide a cloud-based platform of products to enable small and medium-sized businesses to accomplish their marketing goals. In addition, our portfolio includes one of the largest media-owned events businesses in the U.S., USA TODAY NETWORK Ventures. Gannett open roles are featured on various external job boards. BASE SALARY: $70,000-$90,000/annually Job Purpose Our communities are full of stories. USA TODAY Network exists to tell those stories. As an award-winning media and marketing solutions company, our mission is to empower communities to engage with the people and places around them and to take action in bringing their communities together. We are looking for a well-rounded and passionate creative to join our award-winning in-house Creative Team. As a key creative contributor, the Growth Graphic Designer will work closely with Art Directors, Creative Directors, and fellow Designers across brand and growth, to concept and develop creative marketing campaigns and collateral that effectively and distinctively promote USA TODAY Network brands and product offerings to our audiences. Duties and Responsibilities Concept, brainstorm and strategize with creative partners to develop strong integrated multi-channel campaigns across varied platforms. Deliverables include digital, email, social media, and print Create on-brand visual style across various verticals at a high-quality standard with attention to detail Act as a brand-steward, upholding brand standards and consistency throughout projects while learning and promoting best practices for growth and retention focused marketing Demonstrates solution-oriented and analytical thinking in changeable project scenarios Contribute to a creative team culture of conceptual curiosity and innovation, by staying abreast of social and cultural trends to inspire creative solutions Manage time efficiently and juggle multiple projects while staying self-motivated and well organized Supports team leads in collaborating across internal departments to cultivate creative solutions and build partner relationships Qualifications 5-7 years of creative design experience in an advertising/marketing role; agency experience a strong plus Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Communication Design, Advertising Design, or equivalent Full knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite;Figma a plus Experience collaborating with copywriter a plus Impeccable attention to detail, ability to multitask and elevate visual standards is a must Excellent interpersonal, oral and written communication skills. Experience in building and writing presentations a plus. All-around team player who is a self-motivated problem solver A positive attitude and the ability to reframe challenges as opportunities Be able to thrive in a creative and fast-paced environment, with people who are passionate about their work Exceptional portfolio showcasing work across multi-channel campaigns (i.e. digital, email, social media, print). Motion graphics, video editing, HTML and/or illustration are additional advantages. All candidates must include a portfolio to be considered.
